Sentencas: Special high temperature micro-hotplates were investigated for their potential use as a technology platform for miniaturized solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Micro-hotplates -: A platform for micro-solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: To evaluate the compatibility of these hotplates with typical SOFC materials and processing techniques, spray pyrolysis was used for the deposition of an SOFC cathode material (La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3, LSCF) onto the micro-hotplate.
Titulo: Micro-hotplates -: A platform for micro-solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The resulting microstructures and the electrical conductivity of the thin film (thickness similar to 500 nm) were characterized.
Titulo: Micro-hotplates -: A platform for micro-solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Post-deposition annealing in external furnaces as well as using the integrated heater of the micro-hotplate confirmed that these micro-hotplates are suitable for a maximum operation temperature of 800 degrees C and a long-term operation at 600 degrees C. Very fast heating and cooling rates of several 100 degrees C min(-1) were achieved using the micro-hotplate as a heater, allowing fast processing and aging tests.
Titulo: Micro-hotplates -: A platform for micro-solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Bending of the micro-hotplate was found to be critical to the integrity of the thin film, which coats the micro-hotplate.
Titulo: Micro-hotplates -: A platform for micro-solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Bending might be reduced using other membrane materials.
Titulo: Micro-hotplates -: A platform for micro-solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These membranes are potential components for a micro-SOFC in which the integrated heater is used for start-up operation of the fuel cell.
Titulo: Micro-hotplates -: A platform for micro-solid oxide fuel cells
